title: How can I setup visual voicemail on Xfinity Mobile?
content: I am trying to setup native Android visual voicemail on my Pixel 4XL.  I'm on Xfinity Mobile and their VV app doesn't work on newer versions of Android. The Phone app says only to call voicemail to setup VV, but that doesn't work. Any help appreciated.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
